item.title: Israeli Forces Kill 2 Palestinian Militants Wanted for Deadly Attack
item.description: The men were affiliated with a militant group, Palestinian Islamic Jihad, which carried out an attack earlier this month, the military said.

item.title: Palestinians Leave Homes in West Bank as Israel Conducts Raids
item.description: Families left their homes as the Israeli military pressed on with its raids in the city of Jenin, in the occupied West Bank.

item.title: Rebels Backed by Rwanda Close In on Major City in Congo
item.description: Many Congolese see the rebel advance as an invasion of their country by a foreign power in an attempt to seize land and Congo’s valuable rare minerals...

item.title: Saudi Arabia Says It Will Increase U.S. Trade and Investment by $600 Billion
item.description: The Saudi media reported that Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman had spoken with President Trump, who made the kingdom the first stop on his first overs...

item.title: Ukraine Is Losing Fewer Soldiers Than Russia — but It’s Still Losing the War
item.description: Russia has lost about twice as many men to death and serious injury as Ukraine. But the trends favor the Kremlin.
